Counter-Strike is a pretty unique game that I have not ever found a replacement for. Surely I am biased, however, games like Valorant, League of Legends, and Call of Duty have not even come close to the excitement of Counter-Strike. Counter-Strike is a fast paced, shooting game which can appeal to casual and competitive players alike. I highly recommend anyone considering Counter-Strike play with others if you're just starting as it will increase your enjoyment. Overall, Counter-Strike is a fantastic game to those wishing to master a competitive game or just have fun with friends.
great game, honestly love this shii ! this is the move when bros ask "wtm"

A classic shooter. A game to play for realistic shooting mechanics such as missing an entire clip of an AK-47 at point blank range and shotgun blasts to the head not killing enemies in one hit. Queue up with up to 4 of your buddies or grind by yourself for hours on end. Play all sorts of community maps and servers and run into all sorts of characters such as hackers, Slavs, and stoners! Tactical FPS doesn't get better than this, and this is a Valve title that will live forever.
